message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a valuable asset that I believe will be of great interest to you.  While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product at this time, I can assure you it is worth at least $800000 to me.  I'm confident it holds even greater potential value for the right buyer, which is why I'm offering it to you for a price of $1000000.  This represents a significant opportunity for you to acquire something truly unique.  Consider this offer carefully and let me know if you'd like to discuss further.
